parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~62010~~) operation to query the region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The details of the tags bound to the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are attached to the resources.
